## libraries
```{r}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "./data")
library(DESeq2)
library(BiocParallel)
```

## DESeq2
```{r}
system.time(des_pcg <- DESeq(dds$pcg, parallel = TRUE, BPPARAM = MulticoreParam(nc)))
```

## results
```{r}
system.time(
  res <-
    results(
      des_pcg,
      contrast = c("Host", "BL6", "NSG"),
      alpha = qval,
      lfcThreshold = lfc,
      parallel = TRUE,
      BPPARAM = MulticoreParam(nc),
      pAdjustMethod = "fdr"
    )
)
summary(res)
```
